item.title: Lil Inspiration
item.description: The spark The picture represents one of the early experiences I had with machines. Apart from using the ticketing systems in buses and trains in Japan, I had the opportunity to use vending machines and automated ordering systems in restaurants. As a child, I was fond of using these systems. At school, every Friday, we were allowed to get money to vend-out our favorite drink after lunch. I would find every opportunity to make my parents buy food or a drink from these machines.

item.title: drone works
item.description: The picture represents one of the early experiences I had with machines. Apart from using the ticketing systems in buses and trains in Japan, I had the opportunity to use vending machines and automated ordering systems in restaurants. item.title: Heart rate monitor
item.description: The image above is the picture of the heart rate monitor I made during my 2nd year of my undergraduate. I was very intrigued by the way in which the pulse from the body was detected and processed into a wave via a myriad of circuits. It opened up doors for me to navigate through embedded systems, signal processing, image processing and C coding which I would learn in the later semesters.

item.title: Cover image showcase
item.description: Tranquilpeak integrate a unique “cover image” feature. Open this post to see how this feature sublimate your article.

item.title: highlighted code showcase
item.description: Tranquilpeak Hugo theme have its own theme to highlight source code. It’s based on GitHub theme: simple and elegant. Check out how it sublimate source codes.

item.description: This post is used to show how tag plugins are displayed. See docs for more info.

item.title: Video integrations showcase
item.description: Youtube and Vimeo videos are easily integrated thanks to tags plugins. Of course, you can add video other platforms like dailymotion.
